Installing the apk requires authorization first

To enhance your user experience, the app needs to download and store some data on your device during use. Therefore, we require your permission to access storage read and write functions. The app can only function properly once the permission is granted.
The current permission has been denied multiple times and you need to enter the settings interface to manually open it!
This app may not work correctly without the requested permissions.
This app may not work correctly without the requested permissions. Open the app settings screen to modify app permissions.
